name: 葉奕良
objective:
複習矩陣及向量、狀態空間描述法、求解狀態空間方程式、可控制性及可觀察性、穩定性分析、狀態變數回饋系統的設計、簡介最佳控制、簡介強健控制。
Review of matrices and vectors, state space representation of control systems, the solution of the state space equations, controllability and observability, stability analysis, design of state variable feedback systems, optimal control systems, and robust control systems.
schedule:
Week 1. preparation week
Week 2. introduction
Week 3. state-space realization
Week 4. review of matrix computation
Week 5. canonical forms
Week 6. solution of LTI systems
Week 7. solution of LTV systems
Week 8. stability, controllability, and observability
Week 9. midterm exam
Week 10.state feedback control
Week 11.state estimator
Week 12-13.applications of state-feedback control and estimator
Week 14-15.transfer function control design
Week 16-17.other topics
Week 18.final exam
materials:
自編課程講義

Reference：C. T. Chen, "Linear system theory and design", Oxford University Press, New York, USA, 1999.
